entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 6.
